name: Battle Singer
text: Your battle songs can drive your fellow goblins to new heights of frenzy.
benefit: When using bardic performance to inspire courage in allies, you can choose to sing in Goblinâ€”allies who do not speak Goblin gain no benefits from this performance. Allied goblins who hear your battle songs become more energetic and brave, and thus add the bonus granted by your inspire courage ability to all saving throws as a morale bonus.
